body_html:
@poxvoculi I am sorry that on AWS I am only able to use either 8 or 1 GPU on a instance. and on K520 there's no such problem.
Regarding the stack trace, I have already delete the instance because it is very expensive. What stack trace do you need and how can I get it? I am new to tensorflow.

body:
@poxvoculi I am sorry that on AWS I am only able to use either 8 or 1 GPU on a instance. and on K520 there's no such problem.
Regarding the stack trace, I have already delete the instance because it is very expensive. What stack trace do you need and how can I get it? I am new to tensorflow.
